mapper.update: MERGE INTO momeye_count USING DUAL ON (today = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET counts = counts + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (counts, today) VALUES (1, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: select counts from momeye_count where today IN(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
